answers.answer: Diabetes is a CONTROLLABLE chronic disease.  The body cant regulate the sugar in the blood (BG) usualy BG is to high.  diet, exercise and drugs are used to control BG.  If he is a T1 he will need to inject insulin, some T2 also need insulin.We do know that it is carbohydrates that cause BG to rise  ALL carbs raise BG.  whole wheat, brown rice, potato, pasta, most fruit will raise BG.Find Diabetes forums to find out how others control there diabetes.
